1.Text:
One autumn day, lost in thought, No. 666 heads
towards a certain room in Alexandria.

(I wonder why Instructor Lambda summoned me...
I'm sure I've completed all the required training...)

(Judging by her tone, it sounds like a pretty serious
order.)

(Besides, if I'm being summoned to somewhere within
the castle I've never been, it must be something major.
Perhaps...)

(If I'm lucky, I might be participating in a mission.
If not...perhaps it's the start of operations in
Oriana?)

(...Regardless, I am now No. 666 of the Shadow Garden.
I will follow orders and carry out my mission...)

Feeling anxious, No. 666 stands before the door.
Then, she resolves herself and knocks.
It's No. 666. May I enter?
...You're here. Come in.
Understood! Excuse me—
I-It's you!
It's been a while. Maybe since I brought you here?

Upon opening the door, there is another individual
besides Lambda, the one who had welcomed Rose
to the Shadow Garden—Alpha.
...Manners.
M-My apologies! No. 666, reporting!

No need to be so formal. I'm not here to discuss
anything serious.

Is that so? I thought this might be about an
important mission or something...

Well, with the way Lambda communicates, that's
understandable.
M-My apologies...
Then, what is the reason I was summoned here?
Lambda, explain it to her.
Sir! Yes sir!

Rejoice, No. 666. You've been granted permission to
expand your scope of activity within Alexandria.
What?

You heard me correctly. Your activities have been
limited thus far in terms of security clearance
and intel management.

You've been with us for a while, haven't you? Lambda
has told me about your training. She says you've been
working hard every day.
In-Instructor Lambda said that about me?

W-Well... Anyway! This means we'll be placing a
certain amount of trust in you!... Do you understand
the significance of that?

Yes! I will do my best not to betray the trust and
expectations you have placed in me!

Good answer. Well then, Lambda will show you around
the castle today.

You'll likely have more opportunities to work with
the Seven Shadows in the future, so be sure to
introduce yourself when you meet them.
Understood!

I'm counting on you, Lambda. Introduce No. 666 to
everyone.
Sir! Yes sir! We'll get started immediately!
Let's go, No. 666. Don't dawdle along the way.
Understood! Excuse me, Lady Alpha.

Heheh. She seems more relaxed now, unlike before.
Suppose I have Lambda's education to thank.
...Well then, time to attend to my own work.

Let's begin the tour... Be sure not to embarrass
yourself in front of the Seven Shadows.
Understood. I'll be careful!
...Hmph. Very well. Follow me!

(The Seven Shadows... I've heard of them, but what
are they like?)

(I'm sure they are all powerful individuals with
proven extraordinary abilities, like Lady Alpha
and Instructor Lambda...)

(If I am to work with everyone in the Seven Shadows,
as Lady Alpha says, I must learn from them without
being intimidated!)

Her body rigid with nervousness, No. 666 begins
walking through the castle with Lambda...

2.Text:
Here you'll find the living quarters and offices
of the Seven Shadows. Be sure not to set foot
in here without permission.
Understood.

(From here onwards is the domain of the Seven
Shadows... I must be respectful yet also show my
willingness to learn—)
...This music...

Elegant piano music plays from somewhere, and before
she knows it, No. 666 finds herself captivated by the
melody.
(What a wonderful melody...and such skill...)

What're you daydreaming about? Did you get mesmerized
listening to the piano?

M-My apologies... The performance was so incredible
that I got carried away...

But who is playing? It's not like the Garden has
hired a professional musician...is it?

...You're half correct. Lady Epsilon is the one
playing.
Um... What do you mean?

You have an artistic streak to you. Perhaps you and
Lady Epsilon have something in common.

We'll go and greet her after she finishes her
performance. Look sharp!
U-Understood!
Excuse me, Lady Epsilon. Do you have a moment?
Lambda? Sure, come in.

What's the matter? It's about time you visited me for
tea—
...Oh? Looks like you've brought company.

This is trainee No. 666. She's here to introduce
herself as her restrictions on movement within
Alexandria were lifted today.
It's a pleasure to meet you!

Well... I see. Your hair and face look much better
now.

(...What does she mean? She talks as if she knew me
before...)

It seems listening to your performance just now made
an impression on her.
Heheh. Splendid! Well then, can I get your opinion?
M-My opinion?!

Yes, yours. It's important to take in other people's
feedback.
In that case...allow me to speak.

My impression of your music was that it was extremely
intricate and delicate yet imbued with strength.

Also, though I didn't see it with my own eyes, I am
in awe...of the skill with which you precisely played
that complex and speedy melody.
H-How is that for an opinion?

...Yes, you really do have a good ear. Even as you
pursue the way of the sword, you've retained your
appreciation for the arts.

(Wh-Whew... What a relief. It looks like I didn't say
anything out of line.)

Your technique... It's no stretch to say you could
rival a professional. I even mistakenly thought you
were a hired musician...

In fact, with your skill, you'd be highly regarded
as one of the top pianists in the entire Oriana
Kingdom...not to mention anywhere else!
*sigh*
...You haven't told her, Lambda?
No... My apologies...
...Um, did I miss something?

...No. 666, have you heard of a musician called
Shiron?

Yes, I've heard her name a few times... I've not
heard her perform, but I hear she's the talk of
the Oriana Kingdom.

Lady Epsilon here is none other than Shiron, the
musician making waves on the public stage.
What?!

That's right. As Shiron, my true identity is
top-secret, so it's unsurprising you didn't know.

But remember this. The Shadow Garden has infiltrated
the outside world more than you think.

I'm sure that provides you with some food for
thought.

(I see... Thanks to their connections to the outside
world, they could respond swiftly during the attack
on the academy...)

(Just as I expected, the Shadow Garden...the Seven
Shadows are truly enigmatic...)

Heheh. You never know. There may have been a member
of the Shadow Garden right next to you as well.

Perhaps...yes. Even so...it does not concern me now.
I am just No. 666, after all.

Good answer. You must have received quite the
"education" from Lambda.
Um, well...

It must've been tough, huh? Lambda doesn't hold back
when it comes to training.

She used to make me climb mountains for social
bonding... We trained from morning till night.
L-Lady Epsilon...

I still remember the verbal abuse she hurled at me
then. Let's see... Oh right—

I-I'm terribly sorry, Lady Epsilon! Please forgive me
for that!

(I've never seen Instructor Lambda so flustered
before... I wonder what happened...)
Ahem. Lady Epsilon, we should be on our way soon.
Oh, why not stay a bit longer?

No, I must drill the knowledge of the castle's layout
and rules into this one. Let's go, No. 666.
Yes. Thank you so much for your time today!

I'd expect no less of a former princess. Her manners
are impeccable.
...Guess I might as well let her know too.

After Lambda and No. 666 leave, Epsilon also exits
the room...

3.Text:
(What a giant castle... To think such a magnificent
place has been slumbering deep within the forest.)
Hm? This room...

(...Is it some kind of laboratory? There are papers
and tools scattered everywhere...)

...Hm? Hey, No. 666! Don't snoop around too much!
Especially in that room—
You...saw...
Huh?!

L-Lady Eta! I came here to introduce this
individual to you!

(So, this is Lady Eta... Isn't she the brains of the
Shadow Garden?)
What're you doing? Beg her forgiveness as well!
M-My apologies!
I don't mind...

Thank you. I apologize for not introducing her
sooner. This is trainee No. 666.
It's a pleasure to meet you!
Hmm... Doesn't matter who you are...
U-Um?

If you want to apologize, you can become my test
subject... Humans are especially welcome.
Te-test subject?!
Heheh... Anyway, come in...

Huh? Um, are you certain? What about your valuable
documents and—
It's fine. Come on, hurry...
...Very well. Excuse us.
(We're in, but there's nowhere to step...)
Don't step on anything. It's all important stuff...
U-Understood... I'll be careful.
...Huh? Is this...

No. 666 sees a test tube on the desk. It's filled
with bright red blood.
Blood?!

What about it? It's just blood. Don't sound so
pathetic.

My apologies... It's just the thought that this
belonged to your previous test subject...
Yeah, I'm not following you...
Lady Eta, whose blood is this?
...It's the blood of a possessed.

I'm attempting to trace its source to prove my
hypothesis. If the origin of this blood was—
...You know what, never mind. It's a long story.

(She was about to say something... Maybe it was
classified information?)

Anyway, over here... Come help with these blueprints.
I just happened to be short on manpower...

...I see, so that's what you meant. That's why you
invited us in...
No. 666, let's assist Lady Eta.

Understood. Blueprints... Does that mean you're also
interested in architecture?

Interested? Lady Eta was the one who built
Mitsugoshi's headquarters...from planning to
construction.

Hold on... Do you mean Lady Eta single-handedly
constructed that building?!
...That was mediocre.
Huh?

It took two weeks to construct... I took my time to
avoid suspicion.
Two weeks is a frightening speed...
I could do it in three days if I put my mind to it.
...Lady Eta isn't one to joke about these things.

For the record, Lady Eta also created this castle's
training grounds and defense system...in just a few
days.

That was more rewarding. If I had the land and
budget, I would do it again!
Ha, haha...

(She's talking on a scale beyond my comprehension...
But I guess that's the power of the Seven Shadows.)

...Enough chitchat. Both of you are going to do your
share of work.

My apologies, Lady Eta. I am currently on a mission
to show No. 666 around the castle—

It's your punishment for trespassing without
permission.

Ack... Sir! Yes sir! No. 666, you'd better put your
back into it as well!
U-Understood!
Okay, start with this. There's lots of work to do!

In the end, Lambda and No. 666 are not released from
Eta's grasp until long after nightfall...

4.Text:
While No. 666 slaves away in Eta's laboratory,
Epsilon visits Beta's room.

It's rare to see you here in my room.
How can I help you?

Well, you're awfully cold—after I came all this way
to tell you the good news.

...Judging by your words, it doesn't sound like it's
about Master Shadow.
...And here I was thinking you'd be more interested.

*sigh* If you're going to keep wasting my time, then
please leave. I'm dealing with a formidable foe right
now called a deadline.
Fine then, I'll get to the point.

...Natsume's friend paid me a visit. You know, the
former princess of the Oriana Kingdom.
*gasp*

Lambda brought her by earlier. Heheh. That girl has a
good ear for music, doesn't she?
...Is that so?

Talk about an unenthusiastic response.
Aren't you happy?
Not particularly.

Hmm... I thought you two got along quite well,
but I guess not.

We only met as part of my mission. I harbor no
special feelings for her.
Then why did you look so surprised just now?

That's because...it happened sooner than I expected.
I thought it would take a little longer.
Oh, so you do care, after all.
I do not.

...But yes, I should greet her properly at some
point.

Now, please let me work. You're going on a field
survey with Lady Alpha tomorrow, right? Shouldn't
you get back to making preparations?

I-I know that. You don't need to tell me. I was just
leaving.

What was that all about? Thanks to Epsilon...I don't
feel like writing anymore.
Princess Rose...our diverged paths intersect here.

Meanwhile...after being held captive by Eta into the
night, Lambda and No. 666 are finally released...
I didn't think we'd be detained for that long…
Yes...but I'm glad I could be of some help.

Anyway, let's call it a day. It would be rude to
bother them at this time of night.

We'll continue tomorrow... Well, that's what I'd
like to say, but I have to oversee training. I'll
ask someone else to replace me. Be sure to follow
her lead.

She's someone who's looked after you in the past.
You should take this opportunity to thank her.

Someone who's looked after me... Understood.
Thank you for today, Instructor Lambda!

(The abilities of the Seven Shadows are far beyond
what I had imagined... To think that such individuals
are working behind the scenes.)

(I must continue to remain vigilant tomorrow and
always be ready to learn!)

The next day. No. 666 arrives at the designated
location...

(My guide should arrive anytime now. Instructor
Lambda said it was someone who had looked after
me before...)
Hm?!
(I sense someone here... Could it be?)
You are here...Lady Nu.

...Correct. You seem to have honed your abilities
since last we met.

Thank you. Are you, by any chance, the one
substituting Instructor Lambda?

Yes, I will be the one guiding you today. It's nice
to see you again.
Yes, likewise!
Alright, let's get started then.

With that, Nu begins to walk in the direction
opposite the castle.

Excuse me. Where are we going? Are we not heading
inside the castle?

We're going this way. I heard she has the day off,
so she should be up ahead...

At that moment, No. 666 hears the sound of a sword
slicing through the air, followed by a shout.
Swish, swish, swish, swish, swishhhh! Hyaaah!
Whose voice is that?!
It seems my hunch was correct.

Getting too close is risky...but it should be fine if
we call out to her from a distance. Let's go.

No. 666 and Nu walk toward the direction of the voice
together...

5.Text:
No. 666 walks through the training grounds,
led by Nu. There she sees…
Hyaaaahhhh!!! Swish, swish, swish, swish, swishhhh!

(I can tell even from here... That individual has
imbued that long sword with tremendous amounts
of magic power!)

...Indeed, it would be dangerous to approach
carelessly. I can't believe someone can possess
such immense magic power…

If that sword were to land even the slightest blow on
its opponent...it would be deadly.
...Yes, indeed, if the blow were to land.

Judging by the lack of targeted hits, she seems to be
practicing her swings for now, but...her actual power
is immense.
...Oh, Nu? And...

Apologies for interrupting your training. I have
brought someone I would like to introduce to you,
Lady Gamma.

I see. If that's the case, you should've just said
something.
And...why're you standing so far away?

...As a precaution since your attack range is
incredibly vast, Lady Gamma.

Heheh. True. It certainly would be trouble if you
were to become collateral damage to my long sword!

Indeed. So would you kindly lower your sword for a
moment?

I've never cut down one of my allies before, but...
well, I guess I shouldn't be wielding a weapon in
front of a guest.

After carefully confirming that her weapon is
lowered, Nu approaches Gamma.

Well then...No. 666, this is Lady Gamma, who also
happens to be the president of Mitsugoshi.

Nice to meet you, No. 666. I'm publically known as
Luna.
I-I see! Nice to meet you as well!

(So, Lady Eta, who I met yesterday, constructed the
Mitsugoshi building, and Lady Gamma manages it...)

(As Lady Epsilon said, the Shadow Garden has indeed
infiltrated the outside world. Quite deeply and
extensively...)

That said, how did you know I was here? I think I
only mentioned I was taking some time off...

You were in a good mood yesterday while caring for
your longsword. I see you've been training hard
despite your time off.

Yes, I am one of the Seven Shadows. I may be running
the business-side of things, but it doesn't mean I've
abandoned my sword. It's only natural that I continue
to train.
I see. My apologies.
Besides, I've been in great form lately!
...Indeed, very impressive.

No. 666, you were watching, weren't you? What did
you think of my brilliant swordplay?
Um, well...

(The same sort of thing happened yesterday. I wonder
if this is a test...)

I think it was absolutely incredible! If you were
even to graze your opponent, the battle would
be decided right then and there—
...Right. If I were able to graze them...

(Wh-Why does she look depressed?! Right. The
follow-up. I need to follow up on what I said with
something!)

Th-That's right! You would just need to land any kind
of hit!
Any kind of hit?

Y-Yes! Even if it meant you getting a little hurt,
you could take out your opponent...by coming
up with a finishing move!
You make a good point.
(Wh-Whew...)

Well then, Lady Gamma. Apologies for interrupting
your training. We'll be taking our leave now—
Oh, wait. Since you're here, how about a quick spar?
Huh?

(If I face that sword of that magic caliber, I have a
feeling I won't come out unscathed!)

My apologies, Lady Gamma. I still have places to
guide this individual.

It won't take much time. Besides, I feel like I've
got it in me right now.

I'll lure in the opponent's attack, then take
advantage of the momentary opening to
strike a heavy blow... That's how I'll fight!
...Oh dear. I would be glad to spar with you, but—
Come on, Gamma... Please exercise some restraint.
(Whose voice is that?)

6.Text:
Gamma stands before Nu and No. 666, eager for a sword
fight, when a certain someone appears in front of the
three of them...
Facing you wouldn't benefit these two in any way.
Beta! What's that supposed to mean?!

I mean exactly what I said. If your swords don't
clash, they won't get any training; if they do,
someone's getting hurt.
W-Well...

(This is the second member of the Seven Shadows,
Lady Beta... I feel like I've heard her voice before.
There's something enigmatic about her.)
A-Anyway! Did you have some business here?

Not business, per se. I just came to see the face of
the individual we'll soon be working with...that's
all.
...Oh, I see.

I'm sorry for not introducing her sooner, Lady Beta.
This is—
Yes, I know about No. 666.
That's right. My apologies.
Y-Yes!

Lady Alpha and Epsilon are currently on their way
to investigate something. Once they return, they'll likely
have something to tell you.
U-Understood!

Although it's not directly related to the Cult, it's
still an important matter. Wait for Lady Alpha to
convey the details to you.
...Understood!

(Something to tell me... Maybe it's a mission or
something? In any case, I'll give it my all!)

Both myself and Mitsugoshi will be ready to move at
any moment.
And, of course, I'll have my sword ready as well!
That won't be...no, I think that's wonderful.

Indeed. Now, we just wait for Lady Alpha, Epsilon,
and Zeta to report back...

Well, not that I think there's any need to worry
about those three...

On the night Beta makes contact with No. 666, Alpha
and Epsilon investigate the forest near the Lawless
City, guided by Zeta...

...This forest has an incredibly unsettling air about
it.

We've been exploring it for a few days, and it grows
more ominous by the day.
The cause is the tower, no doubt.
But why now?

We'll also need to investigate that and find out
what's happening...
Shh! Both of you, stop. ...Look there.
...Ghouls flooding out of the Lawless City.
I see... So that explains the investigation request.
Graaarghhh!
Oh, looks like they noticed us.

Both of you, be on your guard. And, Epsilon, put on
your slime bodysuit.

Understood! We'll just have to defeat them now that
we've been seen!

Be careful, you two. They can be surprisingly
troublesome.
True. Their numbers are a pain, but...

They're no match for three of the Seven Shadows.
Let's go!
Indeed, we'll make quick work of them.

7.Text: This is the last one!
Graaarrrr...
Extermination complete. Good job, both of you.
They really were troublesome, just as Zeta said.

They weren't this much trouble when I first saw
them... Their numbers and strength appear to be
increasing.

Meaning there's no time to lose... We'll need to move
as soon as we return to Alexandria.
Understood!

I think I'll head back too. It looks like this
situation is growing larger than anticipated.

Yes, please do that. Together with Eta's research
results, we'll discuss the future direction of the
Seven Shadows.

The three return to the Shadow Garden. With no time
to rest, they gather the other members of the Seven
Shadows.
Eta. How is the research I entrusted you with going?

The hypothesis I told you about before... It's quite
promising. But I still lack evidence...

If you've made even a little progress, that's very
good. Thank you for your hard work. Now then...

I'll tell you about the next mission. Our destination
is the Red Tower in the Lawless City.

Our objective is...the Blood Queen who lies there.
We'll proceed with our investigation based on Eta's
hypothesis.

We'll deploy No. 664, 665, and 666 as a three-woman
unit. The three will be under Beta's direct command.

Lambda has assured me of their competence and
balance. I'll leave command to you, Beta.
Understood.

Beware of the creatures called ghouls. Besides,
in the current situation...anything could happen
at any time.
...Yes. I'll be cautious.

And one more thing. We intend to investigate the flow
of money in the Lawless City.

You mean the rumors about the influx of funds into
the Lawless City. We've received intel about it at
Mitsugoshi as well.

My guess is that a considerably unnatural flow has
already been established.
Yes, I agree. Let's uncover everything.

Zeta will continue to investigate and gather intel
around the Lawless City. Epsilon, be on standby.
Just—

I understand. Once everything is settled, we will
take action in the Oriana Kingdom... You wish for
me to prepare for that as well, correct?
Exactly. Please be thorough.

Well, I guess it's business as usual for me. I'll
report immediately if anything happens.

Heh... These meetings go a lot smoother when that
dumb dog isn't around.

Delta... Her strength will no doubt be needed
somewhere. I'll bring her when that time comes.

Lastly, Eta will continue her research. Once you
receive what you need, analyze it at top speed.
Of course... That's what I'm here for.
...That's all the missions.

Our report to Shadow will be delivered tomorrow in
the Shadow Room. Inform the Numbers as well.

This mission will likely be more momentous and
challenging than we imagine... Each of you should
ensure you are prepared.
Understood.

Leave it to me to figure out the source of the funds.
I'll make sure to find a lead.

Yes. Although I'll be on standby, I won't let my
guard down!

Looks like this will be a significant turning point
for the Shadow Garden. I'll do my job as usual.
A chance to unravel the mystery of the possessed!
I look forward to seeing what you are all capable of.
...The world is beginning to move again.
